title: Doctor Unicorn
overview: A time-traveling unicorn and their companions journey through space and time, facing magical threats and saving civilizations across the universe.

title: The Unicorn Witcher
overview: A magically enhanced unicorn monster hunter roams a medieval world, battling supernatural threats and navigating complex political landscapes.

title: Unicorn Plan
overview: A brilliant unicorn professor orchestrates a magical heist with his students, unraveling a web of secrets and lies in the process.

title: The Unicorn Maid's Tale
overview: In a dystopian society, unicorns are forced into servitude and must fight to reclaim their freedom and magical abilities.

title: The Good Unicorn
overview: A recently deceased unicorn finds herself in the magical afterlife, where she must learn to navigate the complex bureaucracy of the 'Good Place'.

title: House of Unicorns
overview: A cunning and ambitious unicorn politician manipulates his way through the magical corridors of power in Washington D.C.

title: The Walking Unicorns
overview: In a post-apocalyptic world, a group of surviving unicorns must fight for survival against hordes of magical zombies and other mythical threats.

title: Unicorn Manifest
overview: Passengers on a magical flight that mysteriously disappeared suddenly reappear five years later, having not aged a day and possessing new unicorn abilities.
